sentences.sentence: They also carried out cytotoxicity tests using human cell cultures.
sentences.translation: 他们还用培养的人体细胞进行了细胞毒性测试。

sentences.sentence: ABSTRACT: OBJECTIVE To study the stability and in vitro cytotoxicity of two kinds of dextran-epirubicin conjugates .
sentences.translation: 目的研究两种方法制备的葡聚糖-表柔比星偶合物的稳定性及体外细胞毒活性。

sentences.sentence: There are still some new methods and techniques - neuroreceptors binding assays, cytotoxicity assays, immunological assays and so on.
sentences.translation: 新的方法有神经受体结合检测技术、细胞毒性检测技术、免疫学检测技术等。
